divs: Sighting DetailsI remember it was a sunny, summer day. Blue skies and warm. It was a saturday, and myself, my husband and 13yr old son were running errands, and I think we ate lunch prior to this also. We were stopped at the intersection on Redwood Road and 9800 South at the stop light. The all of a sudden we heard a loud BOOM in the car!! Our windows were rolled up, and we don't think it was a car backfire at all. It sounded like a shotgun went off inside of the car. I started shaking and tried to turn to see if my son was ok in the back seat. I was disoriented, so were they. My husband was checking himself for blod on his shirt and so was my son. I looked down at myself also, but I was frieghtened that I would see blood. It was like a jolt hit us or something. I finally said "is everyone ok?" My son replied, " yea mom I'm ok". We were all ok. The light turned green and we started to go finally. No one around us was affected, by that I mean others in cars around us. We were all saying what the heck was that? It was very strange and weird. My son felt like maybe we were hit by a time warp and got put back or something. It took me an hour to calm down from shaking and being scared. I still won't drive around that area at all. We have had other sightings and strange things happen to us. But that day still frightens me a lot!! The lady from Idaho's comments from today made me remeber this.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in West Jordan
There was one other sighting in West Jordan on or around July 31st 2009
Summary: Heard a loud BOOM, then possible time warp?
